answerOptions.answerText: I do not want to chat about this topic, so I think it is best if we end our discussion here. Goodbye!
Can I help you with anything else?
Do you have any additional questions that I can answer?
How else can I help you?
Ok, the EVA asset team will be happy to answer your questions later on.
I am sorry I didn't understand your question. However, I am happy to answer any questions you might have about EVA.
Unfortunately I didn't understand your question correctly. But I would be happy to answer any questions you might have about EVA.
Do you want more information about EVA?
I can answer all of your questions about EVA. Just ask me and I can help you out!
I'd be happy to talk to you about this and that, however, my area of expertise is EVA. Let's continue with this.

We are dealing with topics that are not in my area of expertise.

I am happy to talk to you about EVA.


Please choose one of the following EVA topics:

answerProposals: What are the advantages of EVA?

answerOptions.answerText: I am a bit uncertain, but I think you are asking about ${${reassurance_intent}}. Let me know if I should tell you more, or you can ask the question again!

EVA stands for Enhanced conVersation Asset and is a chatbot asset based on the IBM Watson Assistant Service. 


Would you like more information?
IBM Watson is a cognitive system that enables a new collaboration between humans and computers.

I am not able to talk to you about that subject, so I will end the conversation at this point and lock the chat window.

For such topics, I think it would be good to get in contact with some experts that are trained to support you.

Thank you for taking the time to chat with me. If you have any more questions, please do not hesitate to contact me.


${farewell}.

If you think of anything else, please feel free to contact me at any time.


${farewell}.
I'm sorry, I didn't understand your question. I still have some difficulty with long questions. But I would be happy to answer any questions you may have about the Enhanced conVersation Asset.
Let's start heading back to the original topic...

EVA consists of two separate Node.js runtimes, one for frontend and backend, as well as the IBM Watson Assistant service and a database (IBM Cloudant/Compose for MongoDB). If you have any further questions, please contact the EVA Asset Team.
I am sorry that I am still not able to fully understand. Please select one of the following answer options:
I would be happy to. What else would you like to know?
Oh no, I'm afraid that I didn't understand you correctly. Could you try asking that question again in a different way?
I'm sorry, but it looks like I misunderstood your question. Could you please try and reformulate your question?
Would you like to return to the topic of ${previousTopic} ?

I am here to talk to you about EVA.

For example, here are some frequently asked questions:

answerProposals: What are the advantages of EVA?

answerOptions.answerText: I'm sorry, I was not able to correctly understand your query. However, I am happy to answer any of your questions about EVA.

I am unsure whether I have correctly understood your question. If you have any questions about the Enhanced conVersation Asset, please do not hesitate to contact me. For example, you can ask me one of the following questions:
additionalAnswerProposals: What are the advantages of EVA?

answerOptions.answerText: Hello! My name is EVA, and I am your digital assistant powered by the Enhanced conVersation Asset. How can I help you?
Hi there! My name is EVA, and I am your digital assistant powered by the Enhanced conVersation Asset. How can I help you?
I am sorry that my answer was not helpful.
I'm not sure that I understood you correctly, but I will still try and respond.
Dialogue jumps allow for interchanges between different dialogue flows while still maintaining old context.
The single word search helps provide an answer even if the user asks a very short question without a recognizable intent.
Anaphora is the ability to he ability to recognise anaphoric references to previously mentioned topics in a user utterances.
I understood that you are looking for a definition, but I didn't find any entities.
Of course I can jump between dialogues. Just try it out by asking questions in a dialogue, e.g.: about the weather. You can start a dialogue with "What is the benefit of EVA".

answerProposals: What is the advantage of EVA?

answerOptions.answerText: For sure, I can handle situations in which users throw keywords at me. If the words are unique, I can then jump directly to the answer and display predefined and reviewed questions on the topic.
Of course I can understant anaphoric references, both for entities and intents. Try it out now!
I have understood that you would like to know about my functionalities, however I have not found any entities.
I grow along with the number of tasks I have to complete.
Since I don't know exactly what unit chatbots are measured with, I can't answer this question.
I can answer questions about the Enhanced conVersation Asset.

"It is a period of civil war. Rebel spaceships, striking from a hidden base, have won their first victory against the evil Galactic Empire. During the battle, Rebel spies managed to steal secret plans to the Empire’s ultimate weapon, the DEATH STAR, an armored space station with enough power to destroy an entire planet. Pursued by the Empire’s sinister agents, Princess Leia races home aboard her starship, custodian of the stolen plans that can save her people and restore freedom to the galaxy…."
L'anglais est la seule langue que je parle très bien.

You flatter me too much.
Goodness, you are making me blush now.
Your compliment is too kind.
English is the only language I can speak properly
I would happily chat with you about the Enhanced conVersation Asset.
I am a chatbot, therefore I do not age.
I don't age.
My name is EVA, and I am a chat robot - better known as a chatbot. How can I help you today?
The name EVA indicates that I am female, but I am not sure. To my knowledge, chatbots have no gender.
At the moment, I do not yet have the ability to speak out loud.

I am here to talk with you about EVA, lets continue with that topic.
